1. noch nicht das 21. Lebensjahr vollend: 1. hasn't reached 21 years of age, is not gainfully employed and is registered as a job-seeker at an Employment Agency in Germany, or
2. noch nicht das 25. Lebensjahr vollend: 2. hasn't reached the age of 25 and
3. wegen körperlicher, geistiger oder se: 3. is not able to sustain itself due to a physical, mental, or phsychological handicap: To qualify it, the handicap must have occured before the child turned 25 years of age (without age limit).
Angaben zum Zahlungsweg: Information on the method of payment
Ausführliche Informationen zum Kindergel: You can find detailed information about child benefit on the internet at www.bzst.de bzw. and www.familienkasse.de.
Bank, Finanzinstitut (ggf. auch Zweigste: Bank, Financial institution (where appropriate the branch)
Beachten Sie bitte die anhängenden Hinwe: Please pay attention to the attached information and the Child Benefit Fact Sheet (Merkblatt Kindergeld)
Bei welcher Familienkasse (Kindergeldnum: From which Familienkasse (Family Benefits Center) (child benefit-Number, Personal-number)?
Bitte fügen Sie für jedes Kind, für das: please attatch an "Anlage Kind" (Appendix Child) form for each child for whom your are applying for child benifit
Bitte weisen Sie die wöchentliche Arbeit: Please proove the weekly working hours with appropriate documents (e.g. employment contract/certificate of employment from your employer). Deviations from the working hours in the contract can be prooved by submission of payslips, a statement of the work account, or an employer statement. Absence due to vacation, sickness or the like doesn't reduce the contractual agreed-upon working hours.
Der Bescheid soll nicht mir, sondern fol: The notification is not to be sent to me, but to the following person:
Die Berücksichtigung eines volljährigen: The consideration of a child of legal age is possible if it
Die Berücksichtigung eines über 18 Jahre: It is impossible to take into consideration paying child benefits to a child above 18 years of age, if this child has income of more than 8.004 euros that is intended or suitable to cover their living and job-training costs. Because of this, the application for child benefits for a child of legal age must always be complemented with a statement of income and, if necessary, with a statement of income-related expenses.
Die Eintragung der hier abgefragten Anga: The entry of the data requested here is mandatory **in any case**. If the other parent/the parents of the child are deceased, it has to be stated with the addendum "deceased.". If paternity for a child hasn't been legally determined, "unbekannt“ ("unknown") or „Vaterschaft nicht festgestellt" ("paternity not determined") has to be stated.
Die Fragen 6b bzw. 6c sind auch dann mit: You must answer questions 6b and 6c with 'yes' if you, your spouse or life partner or another person related to one the children, work or worked for diplomatic or consular services.
Ein Kind ist erwerbstätig, wenn es einer: A child is gainfully employed, if it pursues an occupation aimed at generating income, that requires its personal manpover. Consequently the term "gainful employment" can be fulfilled by a dependent activity, agricultural and forestry activities, and business and self-employed activities. In comparison, the management of one's own assets is not gainful employment.
Eine Ausbildung (Berufsausbildung oder S: A training (apprenticeship or degree program) is finished, if it qualifies to practise a profession, even though further advanced training is associated with it. This also applies if the certificate of education doesn't entitle to work in a planned profession yet (e.g. sales clerk, paramedic, teacher or lawyer after passing their first state examination).
Folgende Zählkinder sollen berücksichtig: The following counted children are to be taken into consideration:
Für folgende Kinder beziehe ich bereits: I already get child benifit for the following children:
Für jedes Kind, für das Kindergeld neu b: For each child, for whom you claim child benifit, fill in and submit a separate "Anlage Kind".
Hier können Sie einen/eine Empfangsbevol: You can provide the name of an authorised person (for example, tax advisor, tax assistance association, etc) here, who should recieve your child benifit notification.
Hier sind beispielsweise Ansprüche auf k: Here you have to fill in, for example, claims of child-related family benefits that you get from abroad, or child-related benefits from an employment authority (e.g. the European Union).
Hierzu zählt auch die bei einem privaten: This also includes the work for a private employer, as far as public service employees are on leave. Religious communities under the public law (churches including religious orders, church hospitals, schools, and kindergartens and the like) as well as umbrella-/member associations of statutory welfare and bodies associated with them, are not considered as a part of public service.
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to Bundesdatenschutzgeset (the German Data Protection Act): The data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 Einkommenssteuergesetz (Income Tax Act) and regulations of Abgabenordnung (General Tax Code) and the Bundeskindergeldgesetz (Federal Child Benefit Act) and the Sozialgesetzbuch (Code of Social Law).
Hinweise zum Antrag auf Kindergeld und z: Information for the application for child benefit and for "Anlage Kind" (Appendix Child)
Ich bin damit einverstanden, dass dem/de: I agree that the child benefit will be paid to the applicant.
Kinder, für die eine andere Person Kinde: Children, for whom another person receives child benefit, could have an increasing effect on your child benefit (counted children). If you want to consider counted children, please provide information in any case, who is receiving the child benefit for the counted children from which Family benefit office.
Nach Abschluss einer erstmaligen Berufsa: After completion of an initial apprenticeship or a first degree a child in the cases of number 2 (a to d) is only considered if the child doesn't pursue a (detrimental) employment.
Name: Surname
Nur von der Familienkasse auszufüllen: To be filled in by the Familienkasse (Family Benefits Office)
Unterschrift des gemeinsam mit dem/der A: Signature of the applicant's cohabiting husband/wife, partner, another parent or, if approriate, their legal representative.
Unterschrift des/der Antragsteller/in bz: Signiture of the applicant or, if appropriate, the legal representative
Vorname des Kindes ggf. abweichender Fam: Child's first name and, if different from yours, surname
Wenn Kinder außerhalb Ihres Haushalts le: If children are living outside your household, name the reason for it (e.g. accommodations at grandparents/foster care/home because of schooling/professional education.)
Wer bezieht das Kindergeld (Name, Vornam: Who receives the child benefit (surname, name)?
Zu 1 und 2: Angaben zur antragstellenden: For 1 and 2: Information on the applicant and the spouse / life partner
Zu 2: Kindschaftsverhältnis zur antragst: Ad 2: Relationship of child to applicant, to spouse or to life partner and other persons
Zu 3: Angaben für ein volljähriges Kind: Ad 3:Information for a child of legal age
Zu 4: Der Bescheid soll nicht mir, sonde: To 4: The notification should not be sent to me, but to the following person
Zu 5: Anspruch auf eine Geldleistung von: Ad 5: Claim a payment from an authority outside Germany/ from a cross-national or supranational authority
Zu 6: Folgende Zählkinder sollen berücks: Ad 6: The following counted children are to be taken into consideration
Zu 6: Sind oder waren Sie oder eine ande: Ad 6: Do/Did you or another person related to the child during the last five years prior to the application: (...)
a) für einen Beruf ausgebildet wird oder: a) is in a job training or
b) sich in einer Übergangszeit von höchs: b) is in a transition period of no more than 4 months, or
c) eine Berufsausbildung mangels Ausbild: c) can't start or continue professional training due to lack of an apprenticeship, or
d) einen geregelten Freiwilligendienst l: d) performs regulated voluntary service, or
ggf. Geburtsname und Name aus früherer E: birth name and name from previous marriage, if applicable
telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Daytime phone number in case of questions:
„Andere Personen“, zu denen ein Kindscha: "Other persons" to whom the child has a parent/child relationship are: parents, stepparents, adoptive parents, foster parents, grandparents.
„Tätigkeit im öffentlichen Dienst“ bedeu: "Tätigkeit im öffentlichen Dienst" means an occupation as a civil servant/pension recipient /federal, state or municipal employy, employee of local authoities, or employee of another body, institution or foundation under the public law, or as a judge, professional soldier, or a regular soldier.
